item.title: Article_doubler
item.description: 总结V3主要变动 https://medium.com/@vcvckw/%E6%80%BB%E7%BB%93v3%E4%B8%BB%E8%A6%81%E5%8F%98%E5%8A%A8-3b9799d87cf6 Summarize the main changes in V3: https://medium.com/@vcvckw/summarize-the-main-changes-in-v3-8d3c461d0cd5 解析池子参数 https://medium.com/@vcvckw/%E8%AF%A6%E8%A7%A3%E5%BB%BA%E6%B1%A0%E5%8F%82%E6%95%B0-d171c6b5c071 Detailed explanation of pool parameters https://medium.com/@vcvckw/detailed-explanation-of-pool-parameters-a465d91679d2 数据分析DBR产出与TVL和层的关联，拆解DBR产出公式 https://medium.com/@vcvckw/tvl Data analysis of the correlation between DBR output and TVL and layer, and decomposition of DBR output formula https://medium.com/@vcvckw/data-analysis-of-the-correlation-between-dbr-output-and-tvl-and-layer-and-decomposition-of-dbr-0c3a4bebb79b

item.title: Doubler基础教程
item.description: Doubler: A crypto asset appreciation tool based on the martingale strategy 📚What is Doubler? Doubler is a very creative and forward-looking DEFI tool that forms a mutually beneficial relationship between users through crowdfunding and incentives, allowing users to share risks and rewards, and increase user confidence in participating in crypto asset investment. If you hold BTC but don’t want to sell it, but worry about the losses caused by the decline, just join Doubler.
